main event: Three lights of varying brightness were observed in the sky over Dayton, Ohio on 2-17-58.
interesting points: The lights were visible for approximately 5 minutes,The objects made no sound during the sighting,Investigators interviewed multiple witnesses whose statements were consistent,An interception attempt was made but there was no radar contact,The objects appeared to descend steeper and faster than they ascended.
witness description: interviewed observers at the Dayton, Ohio International Airport
